title: Find the Missing Shipment
content:
journey until you encounter a sight on the right side â€“ a set of Mangled Corpses located at (X:-1, Y:516). Approach the corpses and engage with the surviving Hyena. A cutscene will unfold, depicting the Hyena in evident distress. Here, you'll have the opportunity to choose from a variety of dialogue options:

Try to comfort the Hyena. Step back to watch what happens. [Melee Attack] Strike while the beast is vulnerable. Leave.

If you opt to provide comfort to the Hyena, a Baby Gnoll will come o
